Domains

  • Vertex
  • Face
  • Edge
  • Corner
  • Spline
  • ControlPoint
  • CloudPoint
  • Instance

Property names

Domains are properties of geometry sockets:

  • Mesh:

    • verts: Vertex

    • faces: Face

    • edges: Edge

    • corners: Corner

  • Curve:

    • splines: Spline

    • points: ControlPoint

  • Cloud points:

    • points: CloudPoint

  • Instances:

    • insts: Instance
